org.gbif.occurrence.query

Class HumanFilterBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrence.query.HumanFilterBuilder

  • public class HumanFilterBuilder
extends Object
    This class builds a human readable filter from a Predicate hierarchy. This class is not thread safe, create a new instance for every use if concurrent calls to {#humanFilter} is expected. The IN predicate is not yet supported and you'll get an IllegalArgumentException. This builder only supports predicates that follow our search query parameters style with multiple values for the same parameter being logically disjunct (OR) while different search parameters are logically combined (AND). Therefore the {#humanFilter(Predicate p)} result is a map of OccurrenceSearchParameter (AND'ed) to a list of values (OR'ed).
